Django>=1.10
cheroot
Cherrypy

[:python_version <= "3.4"]
Cherrypy==16.0.3

[:python_version == "3.4"]
django<2.1

[:sys_platform == "linux" or sys_platform == "linux2"]

[:sys_platform == "win32" and python_version != "3.4"]

[:sys_platform == "win32" and python_version == "3.4"]
